hero.copy: If you have specialized skills, or you're available on short notice for serving, Dhamma Suttama would like to know!

1.copy: Fill out a quick form to register your interests, skills and availability for the service.
1.title: Sign up

2.copy: After submitting your form, you'll receive a confirmation to your email address and you'll be able to update your calendar availability.
2.title: Confirm your availability

3.copy: Depending on your preferences, we may contact you to meet the centre's immediate needs, or for a project matching your skills!
3.title: We contact you

howitworks.copy: Dhamma Suttama is always looking for help fulfilling the needs of the center. While you can always sign up to serve a course, you can also serve in other areas!
